message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price of $20,000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item that I'm confident you'll love. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $12,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $17,500. This is my best price for now, but I'm open to negotiations. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $17,500 is still a bit more than I had in mind.  How about $14,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I've already met you halfway and then some. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $16,000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to discussing further if you're willing to meet me at this price.
